description: Recently Tommy was cleaning out his car. Yes...he does do other things than just porn...well, sort of.Anyway, he was cleaning his car when we showed up. We thought since Tommy needed a scene for his site, why not just bust out with the cameras right there and film something different.Tommy thought about it, and then agreed, saying we'd have to help him clean his car again once he's done with the shoot. We agreed.Tommy strips and lies down in the back seat....the same back seat that is no stranger of seeing Tommy butt naked, pounding pussy in the middle of the night.Tommy strokes, jokes, and is left covered in his warm man-milk. There's nothing like fresh squeezed semen on red leather!Enjoy!
title: Tommy Jerks In His Car
